TINY.title: Big Bad Tiny Data
TINY.p: Find examples of both valid and invalid markup-line and markup-multiline in a pretend operational context.

part.title: Some valid data
part.p: Here's some okay markup multiline, all clear.
A markup zoo permits all kinds of inline markup including bold, strong, italic, emphasis, code, subscript, superscript, hypertext anchors, and (insertion points and images)
